                                   +----ec.evm$.ShortCircuitLeaf
public class ShortCircuitLeaf
extends TargetLeaf
A ShortCircuitLeaf is a Leaf that has a table of a partial mapping from methods it implements to special ShortCircuitMethods to execute instead of merely lobbing a queue request over out of its vat. (Note, the implementation of this is mostly the same as for ShortCircuitRoot--multiple inheritence sure would be nice!)

See Also:
ShortCircuitMethod, ShortCircuitRoot
